visualizerParams.title: Web Refactor: Progress Steps
visualizerParams.problemDescription: Refactor the progress bar width calculation and button state logic for better maintainability.
visualizerParams.initialCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <script>
    function update() {
      // Verbose if-else for button states
      if(currentActive === 1) {
          prev.disabled = true;
      } else if(currentActive === circles.length) {
          next.disabled = true;
      } else {
          prev.disabled = false;
          next.disabled = false;
      }
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>

solution.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<body>
  <script>
    function update() {
      // Concise boolean logic
      prev.disabled = currentActive === 1;
      next.disabled = currentActive === circles.length;
    }
  </script>
</body>
</html>
solution.explanation: Directly assigning the boolean condition to the 'disabled' property is cleaner and more concise than an if-else block.
